__e: If only there were just one of you.
If they were any bigger, I couldn't see around them.
It was like they were all... comin' after me.
I've looked after their feet as if they were my own, sir.
But where would women like me be if it wasn't for men like you.
But if it wasn't men, I don't know what it would be.
"If only things were different", you said.
I mean, things could be the same if things were different.
A woman a man could love, if things were different.
That was a break, her walking in like that, and suggesting they go to the country.
You'd be wise to get in on the ground floor.
- I' told you to ride for the river.
- I wish - I wish you'd all... go home.
I thought they all went there.
Listen, I really wish that you would go home, though... because Nick and I do want to go to bed together.
If mine were that good, I could eat better.
You know, we could mean something to each other, really, if the $5,000 didn't mean so much to you.
I thought maybe if they weren't too much-
# If they were all like you
If everyone was like you, it'd be a better world.
I wanted things to be like they were, the same, but it just isn't.
